Html:
Hi Radioman!

I've implemented a cache provider for PostgreSQL, based on the existing one for MSSQL. If you think it would be useful, I'll be happy to upload it (by any means).

And by the way, thank you for this awesome work.

Best regards,
Guillermo.

sounds great to have provider for PostgreSQL too, thanks

you can make a fork or just put your code somewhere online

Ok, just created fork PostgreSQLPureImageCache and uploaded there.

Only tested with PostgreSQL 9.0.

Thank you!
